Body:
I have created an windows 10 iot core application and i created the app bundle in appx format. That's installing properly in windows 10 machine. But i want to install in IOT core board

The package file which i have created like below:

    ABC_1.0.9.0_AnyCPU_Debug.appxbundle

I have created through visual studio
Please improve your question and make it more clear, to raise the chances of getting a good answer

You can follow this tutorial to create the the appxbundle.

Then in the windows iot device portal
column9:
select add button to install your app like this:

After that
column10:
you will see this Dialogï¼š

Select browse option to find your app bundle and make sure "I want to specify optional packages" selected like this:

Add all the dependencies(.appx). If you're building for MinnowBoard Max
column11: they are in dependencies\x86 path. If you're building for Raspberry Pi 2
column14:
select next will start the install process. After the process is done successfully you can see your app in the apps list of device portal.

"

Body: @impulse Joule board has x64 architecture. So you can select x64 instead of x86 and ARM.
Thanks @Rita Han.   it's useful for me. What about intel joule board
